headline: Deck the Halls Without the Hazards
summary: The holiday season is here, and decorating your home is a great way to spread cheer and celebrate the magic of the season. If you're planning to light up your home with sparkling lights, festive inflatables and seasonal décor – go for it! Just make sure safety is part of your holiday tradition with these tips from FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE).
